籤詩版本二:
Ukucengceleza imibongo ekutshoneni kwelanga, ukucula iingoma phantsi kwenyanga, ukuqhula ngawo onke amathuba
Xa sidibana, siya kuzimela engxakini kwaye sicule kunye ukuze sicule uLianliluo.ULianli ubhekisela kumthi oqhubekayo. Lufuzisela imvisiswano phakathi kwendoda nomfazi. uLuo Zhiwang. Kuthetha ukuba isibini sibambene. Okanye i-silika kunye ne-satin ibhekisela kwiimpahla ezinemibala.
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokugcina izinto ezindala kunye nokutshintsha nangaliphi na ixesha.
Yonke into ilungile.
解曰: Ubuhle busendlini. Cula umbongo. Kwabakho uvuyo. Ithamsanqa kunye namashwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇USu Xiaomei usengxakini
KuMkhosi weNgoma, uSu Xiaomei wayengudadewabo omncinci kaSu Dongpo. Wayefundile kwaye enesiphiwo. Kubusuku bomtshato wabo, uSu Xiaomei wacengceleza imibongo kwaye wabhala iicouplets. Imibuzo emithathu enzima yayilungiselelwe ukuvavanya umyeni womyeni, kwaye ngabom wenza izinto zibe nzima kumyeni uQin Shaoyou.Xa kwafika kumbuzo wesithathu, uQin Shaoyou wacinga nzulu.
Ngethamsanqa, uSu Dongpo wamnceda ngasese ngaphambi kokuba angene kwigumbi lomtshakazi.
Kukho umbongo othi:
Amanqaku athi ukususela kumaxesha amandulo ukuba udade omncinci unobuqili kunomyeni wakhe;
Umyeni weZintlu eziNtathu uyamangalisa ngenene, yindlu entle engenakulinganiswa nanto ehlabathini.
聖意: Ithamsanqa lasekhaya, ithamsanqa lakho, ithamsanqa kwishishini, ithamsanqa emtshatweni, ithamsanqa kubafazi, uhambo oluya emasimini, iimbungu zesilika zivuthwa, amathamsanqa emfuyo, ukukhangela abantu, ithamsanqa lokumangalela, ithamsanqa. ukufuduka, amathamsanqa kwimpahla elahlekileyo, ithamsanqa lokugula, ithamsanqa lokugula, ithamsanqa kumangcwaba asezintabeni
